trait.name: Brave
entries: Nora has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Nora adds 3 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nora makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage in melee, or 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.
